scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 2 items, chiefly correspondence of John Lothrop Motley.

did.unittitle: John Lothrop Motley to [John] Murray n.y. July 9;

scopecontent.p: Requests that Vol. IV of The History of the United Netherlands be sent to the editor of The Cosmopolitan.

did.unittitle: John Lothrop Motley to Sir Henry [Holland] n.d.;

scopecontent.p: Regrets that he cannot accept Sir Henry's kind invitation.
